set your up speed to 10 below and down speed to default 0 (maximum speed) and this will help you dl the file faster as the up speed wont steal the speed dedicated for your download. If you're going to set the up speed to 10, the up speed will only stay below 10kbps and your down speed  accelerates. hope this helps.
do not forget to switch the speed on the other way around once you're done dl'ing the file so you can help seeding it.

Guys, the hate has gone too far. Funny how a couple people hate on something and everyone else runs with it because they don't want to be wrong. This is basically an evolution of Paranormal Activity (which belongs to the Found Footage genre) into a true horror movie. If you didn't like Paranormal Activity and its sequel, why are you here? I for one think it's good and creepy as hell. All the haters, watch it alone in the dark at 2AM and get back to me.
